item.title: Why You Should Attend PyCon Pune 2017
item.description: No matter you’re new or old to Python New to Python? Don’t know how to get started? No worries! You are in right place. Yes you just read it right! PyCon is one of the best places to learn Python. Old to Python? There will be various talks with deep knowledge and ideas to challenge you. Finally, you have got a place to get people work on your project i.
